19000571.このルーラストーンには\nアグラニの町が 記憶されています。: The town of Agrani is recorded on this stone.

3655.<voice 01959_00003655><start_lip_sync n0:

<voice 02059_00003657><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>What is it, Mr. Broggen's staff?

19001424.<voice 02104_19001424><start_lip_sync n0:

19001425.<voice 02104_19001425><start_lip_sync n0:
These are master Broggen's words! Those who come back to life in a new form, like ,

3663.<voice 02459_00003663><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02459_00003663><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Now, get out your Adventure Log!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3665.<voice 02694_00003665><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02694_00003665><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Whoaaa, the Mark of Adulthood

3666.<voice 02799_00003666><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02799_00003666><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Good for you, <pc>! Now you'll

3667.<voice 02879_00003667><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02879_00003667><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>With this,
it's possible that even the great kings

3668.<voice 02909_00003668><start_lip_sync n0:

3669.<voice 02951_00003669><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02951_00003669><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>The first thing you must do is go

Emblems as proof of your abilities!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3671.<voice 02989_00003671><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02989_00003671><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Now the real adventure begins, <pc>!

3672.<voice 03055_00003672><start_lip_sync n0:
